title: Qualitative set crime rates - independent variable

content.question: In a subsequent study, researchers randomly assigned participants to one of two groups to determine whether viewing a video on actual crime rates enabled participants to make more accurate predictions. One group watched a video about the actual crime rates in recent years, and the other group watched an unrelated video. What is the independent variable in this study?

choices.label: The participants’ estimates of the crime rate after watching either the video about actual crime rates or the unrelated video
The participants’ predictions of the crime rate before watching the video
The amount of information participants already had regarding the crime rate before the study
The video that the participants watched

content.answer: The video that the participants watched

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
